nodes.text: Hatto West was a male human who worked with Kova, Roz, and Facee. During the Imperial Era, the quartet robbed Baron Serk with the help of the Toydarian merchant Nel Henol.
West was first mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
